name: Schnapse
description:
Schnapsen runs on iPad or iPhone. You can play against the Computer or via Game Center multiplayer Support or via Bluetooth.

Functions:

• Select between French and German Deck
• Supported languages: German and English
• Schnapsen against the computer or
• Apple Game Center multiplayer or via Bluetooth
• Three Backgrounds
• Chat between two iPad players
• Opponents can Play on iPad and on iPhone
• Sound effects
